tool_description: Parses and standardizes raw tracking events from different carriers into a unified format.

raw_events.description: Raw tracking events data from carrier API

carrier_format.description: Source carrier format (ups_json, fedex_xml, usps_json, dhl_json)

timezone.description: Timezone for event timestamps (e.g., UTC, America/New_York)

include_location_details.description: Whether to include detailed location information

error_messages: Invalid raw events format: The raw_events data is not in a valid format or is corrupted.
Unsupported carrier format: Use one of [ups_json, fedex_xml, usps_json, dhl_json].
Invalid timezone: Provide a valid timezone identifier (e.g., UTC, America/New_York).
Parsing failed: Unable to parse the raw events data due to format inconsistencies.
usage: Provide raw_events and carrier_format, optionally specify timezone, include_location_details, and filter_duplicates flags.

parsed_events.description: Standardized tracking events in chronological order
